#summary Configuring a World

=Configuring a World=

To configure a world in Potato, open the [AddressBook Address Book], select the world, and click the *Edit World* button. If you're already connected to the world, you can also select *Options* → *Configure World*, or click the Globe icon on the toolbar.

This will bring up the Configure World window. Changes made here do not take effect until you click *OK* to close the window.

World Options are grouped into a number of sections, which are shown on the left of the window. When you select a section, the options are shown on the right. The sections are

  * [ConfigureWorldsBasics Basics]
  * [ConfigureWorldsChars Characters]
  * [ConfigureWorldsConnection Connections]
    * [ConfigureWorldsConnectionTelnet Telnet Options]
  * Display
    * [ConfigureWorldsDisplayANSI ANSI, Colours and Fonts]
    * [ConfigureWorldsDisplayMisc Miscellaneous]
  * [ConfigureWorldsActivity Activity Settings]
  * [ConfigureWorldsMisc Miscellaneous]
  * [ConfigureWorldsFCommands F-Commands]
  * [ConfigureWorldsTimers Timers]
  * [ConfigureWorldsAutoSends Auto-Sends]
  * [ConfigureWorldsNotes Notes]
